name: ロックマン バトル&ファイターズ
summary:
Rockman Battle & Fighters (ロックマン バトル & ファイターズ) is a game released in 2000 only in Japan for the Neo Geo Pocket Color that contains graphically toned down versions of Mega Man: The Power Battle and Mega Man 2: The Power Fighters.
The game has a database with information of 43 characters, including the 18 Robot Master bosses from each of both games (bosses that appear in both games have different info for each game) and 7 main characters: Mega Man, Proto Man, Bass, Duo, Roll, Dr. Wily and Dr. Light.
